attributes.action: investigate bribery of the British Police on behalf of the 'Church' of Scientology.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As can be gathered from the following clip from a 'More4' news programme:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wmFSuxYAj5w

...The peaceful protests of the anti-Scientologist group, 'Anonymous', have been impacted by British police. What is strange is the mention of "thousands of pounds of gifts" from the so-called 'Church' to the British police.

We, the undersigned, demand that the bias of the British police involving this matter be investigated in order to make way for freedom of speech, and ensure neutrality and purity in the British judiciary system free from bribery and corruption.
